subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart earned his second Nascar Sprint Cup victory of the year Sunday in Fontana, Calif., when rain shortened the race by 71 laps to 129.
snippet: Tony Stewart earned his second Nascar Sprint Cup victory of the year Sunday in Fontana, Calif., when rain shortened the race by 71 laps to 129.
